name: MEC Camp Chair
description: Sit back, relax and be a source of campsite envy. For seasons of fireside and beachfront enjoyment, this durable camp chair uses breathable mesh with 600-denier polyester in high stress areas. When you've achieved near-max comfort, whip out the cup holder and revel in the excellent decision you made with this chair.Made of powder-coated steel, with breathable mesh and 600-denier reinforcements.Stow-away cup holder folds up under the seat.Padded armrests.Includes a stuff sack with carry handle.
